price: 6. (Als) een genade van jullie Heer. Waarlijk! Hij is de Alhorende, de Alwetende.
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
